bill.title: Sunshine Law; Uniform Information Practices Act; Appeals
bill.description: Creates a process for an agency to obtain judicial review of a decision made by the Office of Information Practices relating to the Sunshine Law or the Uniform Information Practices Act, and clarifies standard of review. Effective 01/01/13. (CD1)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-02-12 9:30AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 02-07-12 10:15AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Gabbard, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Slom.

(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
